meal.address: 303 Division Ave S, Grand Rapids, MI 49503
225 Commerce Ave. SW, Grand Rapids, MI 49503
meal.requirementsText: Meals for program participants, but you may be able to join by calling first.

groceries.requirementsText: ID required, the market place is downstairs through front door, other doors are closed, free groceries for only one household per month.
Be there at Saturday 7am to get a ticket. Pantry opens at approximately 8:30am. No ID required.

clothing.requirementsText: Clothing is free. Also has Hygiene.
Appointment Required. ID Required. Has clothing, shoes, household items and hygiene products.
Hours by appointment only. Call Nick Nichols from the Calvin Prison Initiative to schedule (616-929-0529). Dress clothes available. Clothing for kids available.
